entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Sprague
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:49 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sprague 04:00 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: WNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
